thread.section_title: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Skipper (formerly Jetaport) | hiskipper.com
thread.title: Joe Lahiff
thread.title_full: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) reviewed by Joe Lahiff

author: Joe Lahiff
title: Joe Lahiff
text: I was a late adopter to the room block idea, and was looking in downtown SF for a holiday weekend. While I was concerned with the lateness of my planning, McGowan Day (my booking advisor) made it super simple. I put in my requirements, total number of rooms, and they did all the work. The response from my selected hotels was extremely fast, and I had a great room block at a great price. I was actually surprised to see the deal we got from one of the nicer hotels in SF for my group. If you are looking to get room blocks done, this is the way to go!
